title: Hamster and 5 OE
body: I have 673 Orange Essences in the Loot Shop and i have Warring Kingdom Tryndamere skin shard that costs 675 Orange essences to upgrade it to permanent,as a low level, i got possible chests from champs i can play,  i would be really thankfull if it is possible to recieve 2 Orange Essence as a gift for my hamster LuLu 2nd birthday, me and LuLu would be really thankfull for an a opportunity to have this awsome skin at last! Love and Kisses from LuLu and thanks from me! <3

replies.body: We definitely like to help when we can, but we aren't currently offering essence gifts.  Your best would be to keep playing and unlock some mastery chests for a chance at more essences.  You're really close, I'm sure it won't be too long!
